item.description:
Letâ€˜s get together over a truly healthy and vibrant and meal!
If you would like to car pool from the Maynard area email me for arrangements.

Renowned chef and author, Alissa Cohen, opened Boston's premier gourmet live cuisine restaurant, Grezzo, in February 2008 and the food is delicious!

Grezzo Restaurant is "...committed to bringing you flawlessly fresh food with its life force still intact. The concept is green, organic and locally-grown vegan, raw food served in an upscale style and setting." The menu will change daily.

Grezzo is conveniently located in the North End of Boston close to a parking garage and subway stops.

You can learn more at www.GrezzoRestaurant.com
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask to be seated with Meetup, introduce yourself to group, and enjoy! :)
item.name: Grezzo Restaurant
